text: Luc Oursel, (7 September 1959 â€“ 3 December 2014), was a French businessman. He was the former chairman of the board of the nuclear company Areva and member of its Executive Committee. He resigned on October 20, 2014 for health reasons. Until June 2013, he was the President of the French Nuclear Energy Corporation. ==References== Category:1959 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Businesspeople from Boulogne-Billancourt
title: Luc Oursel
